alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Haakon; Mellette; Northern Jackson; Northern Oglala Lakota; Southern Jackson; Southern Oglala Lakota; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 13 at 1:13AM MST until January 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwestern South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation and the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Monday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands. Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
